zone.line: With wheel & comb, roller & stirr up.
True your beard is ?frized, then lift you the bolt
Allows herself Nature of Viels not to be robbed
And what She to thy spirit not open may
That you her not from with levers & screws
You, the old materials which I not employ
You stand now here, because thee my father needs
You the old scrolls, you entangle smoky
So long as on this desk the melancholy lamp smokes.
Far better had I then my little squandered
Since with the least it troubles here to labour!
What you inherited from your fathers have
What here not profits, is a heavy burthen
Now what a moment creates that can it profit
